body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved         Whether you clean national cemetery headstones on a volunteer work day, shop at a park store, or follow Jean Lafitte on social media, there's a way to get involved with the park that's right for you!   If you'd like to be part of the adventure of Jean Lafitte, follow the links below to find out how you can get involved.  NPS Centennial: the 100th birthday of the National Park Service is in 2016; discover how Jean Lafiitte is getting ready for the big event, what centennial events you can attend, and what's happened so far. Donate: find out how to support Jean Lafitte by sharing your time, talents, or funds---or just by being a good park visitor. Work with us: learn about jobs at Jean Lafitte and throughout the federal government or how to volunteer at the park Do business with us: read about commercial uses and other business permits on the permits and reservations page Find planning documents, goals, and guidelines as well as projects available for public review and comment Join Jean Lafitte's social media crew
title: Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve: Get Involved
